title: The meta is so bad Soraka Top can get you to diamond

replies.body: what does the word meta even mean to you
Dunno why you think this is a sign of a bad meta. If anything, I take it as a sign of GOOD meta.
playing adc darius can get you to diamond

Its almost like playing a champion well >> Playing meta (At least until you get to high elo)

Sure you get people mad at you, but if its stupid and it works it isn't stupid
correction, this one skilled player who knows rakas playstyle so well could get to diamond by taking her top
Explain why it's bad to have meta shifts?
Yet you've never gotten out of low gold.

there was a time soraka was too op and could go solo lane so they ''reworked'' her (nerfed to hell)

and now look at where we are , square 1 again lmao
